## Biography

Beomjo Park is a fifth-year Ph.D. student in the Dept. of Statistics & Data
Science at Carnegie Mellon University. Under the guidance of Sivaraman
Balakrishnan and Larry Wasserman, his research focuses on robust statistical
inference, specifically addressing model misspecification and data corruption.
His previous work includes interdisciplinary applications in Oceanography and
Biostatistics, with a central emphasis on Bayesian semiparametric models and
variational inference.
